title: Apple releases watchOS 8.4.2 to all users
content:
Nine days after seeding watchOS 8.4.1, Apple is releasing today watchOS 8.4.2 to Apple Watch users. The build number is 19S553.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.4.2 to all users appeared first on 9to5Mac.
